name: Lorem Machina
description:
Hi there ! 

Lorem Machina is a French Student Game of a First Person Survival & Puzzle game with some aspects of infiltration. 

You'll play as a robot that just woken up in a strange and weirdly empty facility.. or, is it ? Try to solve the mystery about this place and most importantly, escape ! 

The game was realized with 7 people in about 2 months.

The team hope you'll like the game ! And if you have any feedbacks, don't hesitate to comment !
